department.dept_long_name: Department of the History of Art and Architecture

course.title: Voices in Chinese Painting
course.description: Seminar explores the "voice" in Chinese paintings from the eleventh- through eighteenth centuries. The goal is to 1) test the validity of transposing "lyrical voice" to the study of painting and 2) formulate a methodology of historicizing pictorial rhetoric by considering both textual cues and material medium while favoring neither.
